title: Squared Up with Exclamation Mark

adjectives: Being or moving higher in position or greater in some value; being above a former position or level
Extending or moving toward a higher place
Moving up, directed toward a higher place.

description: TheÂ wordÂ up with an exclamation point after it, shown enclosedÂ in a square. Originally intended to denoteÂ leveling up in a game.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the up button emoji is designed as a clean, rounded square with a prominent, upward-pointing arrow rendered in a bright, solid color, enhanced by Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and subtle highlights. The smooth gradients and soft edges give it a tactile, modern feel, symbolizing ascent, progression, or moving forward. This emoji is commonly used on Apple devices to indicate approval, increase, or a desire to move to a higher level.
